subject: Horse Racing
Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
Preakness Stakes
lead_paragraph: Rachel Alexandra came to the Preakness to achieve her destiny, as perceived by Jess Jackson and all the others who took part in her transfer, who had the audacity to let her loose.
snippet: Rachel Alexandra came to the Preakness to achieve her destiny, as perceived by Jess Jackson and all the others who took part in her transfer, who had the audacity to let her loose.
